name: CoOpVrOfficeEscape
description:
In this game you will see the world from another person's eye through google cardboard and try to escape from an office by solving physical puzzles.

https://youtu.be/boDaRAwwzgU

Our team's name is Garaj.

Team members are Birkan Kolcu, Ferhat Melih Dal, Zeliha Çetin, Halil Samed Çıldır
